response.original_title: The Eternal Recurrence of Unique Conditions
response.overview: Exploring themes of repetition as a form of change, this abstract music video employs a technique of analog video synthesis called raster scan processing. Chaotic imagery is generated with an LZX-compatible video synthesizer feeding back through a vintage XYZ vector monitor. Color and movement are controlled in real time with digital and analog tools, including a PC and a battery of Eurorack audio modules.
response.title: The Eternal Recurrence of Unique Conditions
